channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Pray For Me
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Pray For Me

item.title: CVE-2024-3965|2024-06-14T06:00:02.754Z -- unknown -- pray%20for%20me
item.description: The Pray For Me WordPress plugin through 1.0.4 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-3966|2024-06-14T06:00:02.940Z -- unknown -- pray%20for%20me
item.description: The Pray For Me WordPress plugin through 1.0.4 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could unauthenticated visitors to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks that trigger when an admin visits the Prayer Requests in the WP Admin
